welcome.description: Use this site to verify your ballot was recorded and sealed correctly.
find-my-ballot.description: Enter the ballot checking code displayed in the Mark.It app and click <2>Enter</2>
find-my-ballot.error-description: Please verify you entered the tracking code correctly. Be sure to match case.
ballot-found.description: Tap the <1>Code entered</1> button in the Mark.It app.
ballot-found.timeout: Tap the <1>Code entered</1> button in the Mark.It app.
passkey.description: Please confirm that the following key matches the one displayed in the Mark.It app.
passkey.timeout: You have to confirm that the pairing codes match in the Mark.It app.
finish.header: Thank you for using the VerifyMyBallot site
finish.description: The verifying process is finished and you can close this site.
about.description: This site serves as a ballot checking site to enable you to <2> verify that your ballot was recorded correctly </2> in your voting app and will be cast correctly in the digital ballot box.
about.question-text: Can i submit my ballot on this site?
about.answer-text: This site cannot submit your ballot for casting. Remember when finished with the ballot check, you must submit your ballot from the Mark.It app to complete the voting process.
faq.question-text-1: Where do I find my ballot tracking code?
faq.question-text-2: My ballot is not found. After I input the ballot tracking code, I am getting an error message.
faq.question-text-3: The displayed passkey does not match. What do I do?
faq.question-text-4: Can I submit a ballot on this site?
faq.question-text-5: I want to submit my ballot. What do I do?
faq.answer-text-5: You must submit your ballot from the Mark.It app to complete the voting process. In case of any problems you should contact your local election office and talk to the election official - phone number: 090090990, email: localeo@yourelection.com
error.description: A valid election could not be loaded based on the inferred information.
expired.description: No action was found on the board within expected period of time. Try verifying again.
a11y-popup.label: Accessibility adjustments pop up
timeout-modal.label: Timeout reminder pop up
